for x in xrange(0, input()):
	a = input()
	numbers = map(int, raw_input().split())
	list = {}
	maximum = max(numbers)
	for x in xrange(0, maximum+1):
		list[x] = 0
	for x in xrange(0, a):
		list[numbers[x]] = list[numbers[x]] + 1
	maximumValue = -1
	maximumCount = -1
	for x in xrange(0, len(list)):
		if list[x] > maximumCount:
			maximumCount = list[x]
			maximumValue = x
	print maximumValue, maximumCount
